狵字的基本解释

狵
máng
古同“尨”，毛多色杂的狗。

狵
dòu
二十八宿尾星名：“日月会于龙狵。”

狵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［máng］
［《廣韻》莫江切，平江，明。］
多毛狗。
[②]［zhuó］
［《集韻》竹角切，入覺，知。］
同“1”。
二十八宿尾星名。

狵字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　狵； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页711第16
【廣韻】莫江切，音厖。【玉篇】犬多毛也。【廣韻】亦作尨。　又【集韻】竹角切，音琢。本作?。或作?。詳豕部?字註。

狵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
狵字的起名意思

二十八宿尾星名。

狵
Basic explanation of words
狵
máng
The ancient Tong "sao", the dog with multi-colored hair.
狵
dòu
Twenty-eight star name: "The sun and the moon will be in Longxuan."
狵
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [máng]
["Guangyun" Mo Jiangqie, Pingjiang, Ming. ]
Hairy dog.
[②]［zhuó］
["Ji Yun" bamboo corner cut, enter consciousness, know. ]
Same as "1".
Twenty-eight star names of Alterna.
狵
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　狵; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 711 16
[Guang Yun] Mo Jiangqie, Yin Pang. [Jade articles] Dogs are also hairy. [Guang Yun] also as a shao.　[Jiyun] Bamboo corner cut, sound cut. This work?. Or for?. Detailed hog department? Note.
狵
Source glyph
Font comparison: Song Ti, Mainland China
Taiwan Minutes
Korean Ming Dynasty
狵
Name meaning
Twenty-eight star names of Alterna.
máng, zhuó
blend; variegated; striped
